name: Foodeez
slogan: Making dining out with dietary requirements simple
description: Foodeez is an app for people with dietary requirements, such as gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian and more. It helps these people find places to eat and present suitable dishes more intuitively.

team.name: Adam Boulkroune
team.bioHtml: Founder of Foodeez. UX/UI designer. Degree in Rocket Science

jobs.title: Technical partner / CTO / Full-stack mobile dev
jobs.description:
You'd be joining me as the co-founder of Foodeez. Fully responsible for the tech stack, you might also have to get your hands dirty with other aspects of launching a product. Be prepared to bootstrap it!

There's a clear demand from consumers and a number of local restaurants have pre-registered. The app is fully designed, so it would be great to get a working version out there in the wild.

It would also be great to hear your personal motivation for helping people with dietary requirements.

My background: UX/UI designer with 5 years experience making digital products.
